                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2841%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A124953%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北新增2841例累计24953例#</a>】2020年2月7日0时-24时，湖北省新增新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎病例2841例，其中：武汉市1985例、孝感市172例、黄冈市144例、鄂州市98例、襄阳市69例、黄石市68例、荆州市56例、仙桃市52例、十堰市43例、随州市38例、荆门市35例、咸宁市33例、宜昌市23例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItcqG8dlH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469592941957941:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469592941957941&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【元宵心愿签<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】今日<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%83%E5%AE%B5%23&amp;from=default">#元宵#</a>。想给彻夜守护生命的你，送一碗滚烫的感恩与敬意。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </div>
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8D%97%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E8%B6%85%E7%99%BE%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#湖南累计治愈患者超百人#</a> 无一死亡病例】截至7日下午6时，湖南省一天内共有23例新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎患者治愈出院。至此， 湖南累计治愈114名患者，无一死亡病例。今天出院的患者中，长沙市有9例，衡阳市6例，邵阳市3例，怀化市3例，郴州市2例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B9%96%E5%8D%97%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=湖南日报">@湖南日报</a> <a title="我省新增23例确诊患者治愈出院 累计治愈114名..." href="http://t.cn/A6Pgz2mH" alt="http://t.cn/A6Pgz2mH" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>我省新增23例确诊患者治愈出院 累计治愈114名...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469477196200527" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It9pZq12v?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 23:37" date="1581089865000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469477196200527:fromprofile"> 2月7日 23:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC95%E5%B2%81%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%23&amp;from=default">#南京95岁确诊患者治愈#</a>】据南京市卫健委消息，今天下午，南京有2位患者经反复核酸检测均为阴性，经专家组评估，符合肺炎确诊病例解除隔离和出院标准。其中，1例患者出院，另1例患者已95岁，其家人因感染正隔离治疗，老人目前无人照顾，转出隔离病房后将留院进行康复治疗 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It9pZq12v" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469477196200527:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469477196200527&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5898186921&amp;cid=4469477284347615&amp;nick=自体脂肪新氧姐&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                <a name="4469468011254741" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It9bb5gpL?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 23:01" date="1581087675000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469468011254741:fromprofile"> 2月7日 23:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【小学生给护士妈妈的信：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E6%89%8B%E5%B7%B2%E7%BB%8F%E5%B9%B2%E8%A3%82%E5%BE%97%E4%B8%8D%E6%88%90%E6%A0%B7%E5%AD%90%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#妈妈您的手已经干裂得不成样子了#</a>】“您每天早上天都还没亮就赶赴一线了，您的手已经干裂得不成样子了...”这是福建一小学生写给妈妈谢小燕的一封信。由于每次上岗都要带橡胶手套，下岗后又要严格消毒，护士谢小燕的双手被滑石粉和消毒液腐蚀得干裂出血 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It9bb5gpL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469468011254741:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469468011254741&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=It9b90NOX&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609335286&amp;ssig=8tJ1O3QzOC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469467990191515" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It9b90NOX?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 23:01" date="1581087670000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469467990191515:fromprofile"> 2月7日 23:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469461349920173" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It90qFCGN?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 22:34" date="1581086087000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469461349920173:fromprofile"> 2月7日 22:34</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E5%90%84%E7%BA%A7%E5%90%84%E7%B1%BB%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A12%E6%9C%88%E5%BA%95%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%8D%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#安徽各级各类学校2月底前不开学#</a>】根据疫情发展情况，经安徽省政府同意，安徽省各级各类学校（高校、中小学、中职学校、技工院校、幼儿园、托儿所等）2月底前不开学。具体开学时间，将视疫情防控情况，经科学评估后确定，届时提前向社会公布。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;延迟开学期间，各级教育行政部门要加强管理和指 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It90qFCGN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469461349920173:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469461349920173&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%B0%A7%E6%B0%94%E4%BE%9B%E5%BA%94%E7%B4%A7%E5%BC%A0%23&amp;from=default">#武汉医院氧气供应紧张#</a>】武汉市肺科医院院长彭鹏表示：目前还有一个突出问题就是氧气供应。重症病人需要100%吸氧。目前医院氧气用量已达到日常用量峰值的10倍以上。呼吸机需要氧气进行驱动，氧气不能增加，就不能投入更多呼吸机，限制了危重病人的救治。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4469449518002456:1042163-video:1042163%3A4469449433219134:page_100206_home:2286908003:4469449518002456:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PdgZp7" alt="http://t.cn/A6PdgZp7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/wanglin110" usercard="id=5631590631">水婴儿</a>：哈哈哈哈，钢厂不是生产钢铁吗？怎么还有氧气？                    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E9%81%BF%E5%85%8D%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E6%98%BE%E7%A4%BA%E9%98%B4%E6%80%A7%E8%80%8C%E8%A2%AB%E9%81%97%E6%BC%8F%23&amp;from=default">#如何避免检测显示阴性而被遗漏#</a>？】湖北省医疗专家组组长赵建平：鼻咽拭子核酸检测的阳性率目前大概在30%-40%，检测阴性不能排除新型冠状病毒肺炎，即使多次检测也不能排除。在武汉以及湖北的部分地区，临床的表现就比较关键。如果病人的临床表现有淋巴细胞下降、典型的病毒性肺 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It8E6B1Uf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469447508825467:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469447508825467&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4469435039422790" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It8jZDxiu?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 20:50" date="1581079814000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469435039422790:fromprofile"> 2月7日 20:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【分秒必争！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%A5%B3%E5%86%9B%E5%8C%BB4235%E6%9D%A1%E6%9C%AA%E8%AF%BB%E6%B6%88%E6%81%AF%23&amp;from=default">#抗疫女军医4235条未读消息#</a>】疫情来袭，医护人员夜以继日与死神较量，甚至无暇拿起手机给家人报个平安。军队支援湖北医疗队女军医彭渝瞒着家人奔赴抗“疫“前线，几天后拿起手机，竟有4000多条未读消息，当看到其中一条来自丈夫的暖心消息时，倔强勇敢的她没有忍住眼泪…<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%8B%E7%BA%AA%E5%AE%9E?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=军事纪实">@军事纪实</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It8jZDxiu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469435039422790:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469435039422790&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【原来是你！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%AB%E5%A6%87%E7%97%85%E6%88%BF%E5%89%8D%E5%81%B6%E9%81%87%E6%8B%A5%E6%8A%B1%23&amp;from=default">#一线医护夫妇病房前偶遇拥抱#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月4日，浙江绍兴市人民医院隔离病房的通道上，监控录像记录了一对医护夫妇的偶遇。画面中两位穿着防护服的医护人员是陈炳和徐小奇夫妇，在病区的走廊上相遇，当确定是对方后，他们轻轻拥抱了一下，很快又继续自己的工作。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It8cpwrw1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469430337732269:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469430337732269&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469423836873654" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It81VsQ9o?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 20:05" date="1581077142000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469423836873654:fromprofile"> 2月7日 20:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【不要隐瞒！全国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B6%8520%E4%BA%BA%E6%95%85%E6%84%8F%E9%9A%90%E7%9E%92%E8%87%B4%E4%BA%BA%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%A2%AB%E7%AB%8B%E6%A1%88%23&amp;from=default">#超20人故意隐瞒致人感染被立案#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E9%83%A8%E5%88%91%E4%BE%A6%E5%B1%80?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=公安部刑侦局">@公安部刑侦局</a>，近日，全国各地陆续出现新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎患者故意隐瞒病例情况，目前已有超20名患者因故意隐瞒病例，致多名人员感染和隔离。各地公安机关以涉嫌危险方法危害公共安全罪对这20余名患者分别立案侦查。不要隐瞒！不要隐瞒！不要 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It81VsQ9o" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469423836873654:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469423836873654&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4469420649181366" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7WMCwuy?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 19:53" date="1581076383000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469420649181366:fromprofile"> 2月7日 19:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【河南长垣<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E6%82%AC%E8%B5%8F%E9%80%9A%E7%BC%892%E5%90%8D%E5%88%B6%E5%94%AE%E5%81%87%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%A8%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%23&amp;from=default">#警方悬赏通缉2名制售假医用口罩人员#</a>】据河南长垣市公安局，与该市相邻的安阳滑县2人涉生产销售假冒伪劣医用口罩，被警方通缉，目前该案其他人员已归案，已查扣机器4台，追缴涉案资金34万元。警方通报称，犯罪嫌疑人杨会昌（男，38岁，河南省安阳市滑县高平镇前留寨村人）、犯罪嫌疑人张伟 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7WMCwuy" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469420649181366:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469420649181366&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%AA%E7%BB%8F%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E6%89%B9%E5%87%86%E4%B8%80%E5%BE%8B%E4%B8%8D%E5%87%86%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%23&amp;from=default">#未经学校批准一律不准返校#</a>】7日，教育部召开全国教育系统应对新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情防控工作视频会议。指出严格管控学校校门，未经学校批准学生一律不准返校，校外无关人员一律不准进校门，师生进入校门一律核验身份和检测体温，对发烧咳嗽者一律实行医学隔离观察， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7NU8C04" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469415142052700:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469415142052700&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                <!-- 删除 -->
                                <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                                                <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" action-data="cid=4469423269920390&amp;is_more=1&amp;type=small&amp;ouid=" action-type="commentDialogue">查看对话</a></span></li>
                                                                <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                <!-- 回复 -->
                                <li>
                                    <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6452163647&amp;cid=4469423269920390&amp;nick=小徐同学上线了&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4469413455244924" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7Lbm0ry?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 19:24" date="1581074667000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469413455244924:fromprofile"> 2月7日 19:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【疫情防控工作落实不力 双鸭山市2名干部被免职】双鸭山市友谊县副县长吕红，未按规定组织开展对武汉以外的外来和归乡人群进行有效排查管理，流行病学调查工作滞后，工作失职失责，对疫情防控工作造成严重影响。免职处理。<br>双鸭山市友谊县卫健局局长毛帮辉，在疫情防控工作中对流动 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7Lbm0ry" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469413455244924:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469413455244924&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2207970473" usercard="id=2207970473">王泳淇H</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href=""><i title="" class="" node-type="daren"></i></a>：据我了解，这个副县长一直很尽职尽责的，很早前就统计数据，正县长不作为要找背锅的，家里那帮人都心照不宣，知道怎么回事，这次友谊那些病例是因为有病人隐瞒武汉史，导致医护人员等人感染等，这人应该判死刑                    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%B1%E4%B8%83%E8%99%8E%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E4%B8%BA%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%8D%90%E6%AC%BE650%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#钱七虎院士为武汉捐款650万#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】疫情当前，中国工程院院士钱七虎分两次向武汉捐款650万元。年过八旬的钱老，是我国著名防护工程专家，现任军委科技委顾问、陆军工程大学教授。去年，他就曾把获得2018年度国家最高科技奖的奖金800万元全部捐赠，资助贫困学生上学。致敬！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7IJunWQ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469411937241900:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469411937241900&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=It7BBsLhv&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609335296&amp;ssig=RvoKmLQRVp" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469407516854937" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7BBsLhv?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 19:00" date="1581073252000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469407516854937:fromprofile"> 2月7日 19:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%A9%E6%8A%8A%E5%B0%8F%E9%BB%84%E9%B8%AD%E9%87%8C%E7%9A%84%E9%92%B1%E9%83%BD%E6%8D%90%E7%BB%99%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#女孩把小黄鸭里的钱都捐给武汉#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月1日，江苏扬州一名10岁小女孩在家人陪同下，将一只沉甸甸的小黄鸭储蓄罐送到派出所，里面是她攒下的零花钱，共计495元，还有一张纸条上写着“武汉加油”！将储蓄罐送来后，小女孩一蹦一跳地离开了。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%8D%94%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=荔直播">@荔直播</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4469407516854937:2017607-video:2017607%3A4468207109472279:page_100206_home:2286908003:4469407516854937:2286908003" title="荔直播的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PHRjrp" alt="http://t.cn/A6PHRjrp" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>荔直播的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609335296&amp;ssig=RvoKmLQRVp" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469405213435428" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7xTepI8?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 18:51" date="1581072703000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469405213435428:fromprofile"> 2月7日 18:51</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%B5%E5%B7%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A181%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#贵州新增4例累计81例#</a>】2月7日0—12时，全省新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎新增确诊病例4例，新增治愈出院病例0例。其中：新增确诊病例中，毕节市4例。<br>截至2月7日12时，全省累计报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎病例81例。36例有武汉旅居史，4例有除武汉外湖北其他地区旅居史，6例有湖北以 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7xTepI8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469405213435428:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469405213435428&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609335296&amp;ssig=RvoKmLQRVp" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469404500460795" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7wK1VSb?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 18:48" date="1581072533000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469404500460795:fromprofile"> 2月7日 18:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%8B%90%E7%82%B9%E5%88%B0%E6%9D%A5%E8%BF%98%E8%A6%81%E5%87%A0%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称疫情拐点到来还要几天#</a>：关键仍要早发现早隔离】7日下午，钟南山院士回应“全国新增确诊病例连续两天明显下降”时表示，这并不能证明拐点到来，他个人估计这个拐点到来还得有几天。现在看起来早发现、早隔离的工作开始起效了。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%BE%8A%E5%9F%8E%E6%99%9A%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=羊城晚报">@羊城晚报</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4469404500460795:1034-video:1034%3A4469400166924316:page_100206_home:2286908003:4469404500460795:2286908003" title="羊城晚报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Pdxzvw" alt="http://t.cn/A6Pdxzvw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>羊城晚报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4469404500460795"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>161</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E7%A1%AC%E6%A0%B8%E9%A2%86%E8%8F%9C%E6%94%BB%E7%95%A5%23&amp;from=default">#武汉小区硬核领菜攻略#</a>走红：微信叫号，团购零交流】“微信群叫号，叫到号的下楼取菜，未叫到的在家做好准备。”“5人一批，间隔2米排队，零交流。”“菜品不对的，请至空旷无人区电话咨询。”近日，武汉一小区的“硬核领菜攻略”走红，9位业主筹划3天，预判了能想到的突发情况。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7sLkyIg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469402034900000:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469402034900000&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%BA%94%E9%80%82%E5%BD%93%E8%BD%AE%E4%BC%91%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山建议医护人员应适当轮休#</a>并规范防护】针对如何保证一线医护人员健康？钟南山表示：首先，需要很规范的防护。这点上我们是有教训的，由于没有或忽视规范防护，一线医护人员病倒，这造成很多工作的被动。另外，建议各个地方给医护人员提供轮休机会，因为过度疲劳更易感。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7oRgESM" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469399613970404:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469399613970404&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月7日 18:31</div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=1058301141&amp;cid=4469398225588556&amp;nick=发声不同憨批就会怼你&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月7日 18:23</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469396334635705" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7jzjrXr?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 18:16" date="1581070586000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469396334635705:fromprofile"> 2月7日 18:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【好消息！三亚又有2例确诊病例出院】7日下午，三亚中心医院又有2例新冠肺炎确诊病例患者经过综合诊治，符合国家卫生健康委新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例解除隔离和出院标准，于当天出院。截至2月7日，海南省累计10例确诊病例痊愈出院。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6PdtZEY" alt="http://t.cn/A6PdtZEY" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E6%B5%B7%E5%8D%97%E8%A7%86%E7%AA%97?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网海南视窗">@人民网海南视窗</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E7%A0%B4%E9%97%A8%E5%B0%86%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E9%85%8D%E5%90%88%E7%9A%84%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E9%80%81%E5%8C%BB%23&amp;from=default">#民警破门将拒绝配合的疑似患者送医#</a>】2月4日，湖北十堰。一60岁老人出现新冠肺炎症状，且家中两人确诊。其有精神病分裂症，拒不配合送医，民警破门处置，贴身缠斗后成功送医，老人被确诊，民警正在隔离中。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4469394917111628:1034-video:1034%3A4469393028218888:page_100206_home:2286908003:4469394917111628:2286908003" title="澎湃视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PdcpNe" alt="http://t.cn/A6PdcpNe" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>澎湃视频的微博视频</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%BE%8E%E6%B9%83%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=澎湃新闻">@澎湃新闻</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469393901805669" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7fE7zJH?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 18:06" date="1581070005000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469393901805669:fromprofile"> 2月7日 18:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【河北<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%82%A2%E5%8F%B0%E4%B8%80%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E9%9A%90%E7%9E%92%E7%97%85%E6%83%85%E8%87%B477%E4%BA%BA%E5%AF%86%E5%88%87%E6%8E%A5%E8%A7%A6%23&amp;from=default">#邢台一患者隐瞒病情致77人密切接触#</a> 警方已立案】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%82%A2%E5%8F%B0%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=邢台发布">@邢台发布</a>，河北省邢台市应对新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情领导小组办公室7日透露，邢台市确诊一例故意隐瞒事实病例，目前已排查出包括医护人员在内的密切接触人员77人，警方已立案侦查。<br>　　患者刘某某，女，64岁，邢台市内 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7fE7zJH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469393901805669:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469393901805669&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469391930047398" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It7ct0cku?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 17:58" date="1581069536000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469391930047398:fromprofile"> 2月7日 17:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【91岁！全国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%B4%E9%BE%84%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#年龄最大治愈患者出院#</a>】7日上午，91岁高龄的新冠肺炎患者王某从宜昌市第三人民医院出院，这是目前年龄最大的治愈患者。患者1月19日出现发热、咳嗽、乏力等症状，1月23日因不明原因肺部感染入院治疗，两天后被确诊。经过十几天的精心治疗，王某达到解除隔离治疗标准， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7ct0cku" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469391930047398:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469391930047398&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%9D%91%E7%BB%84%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#湖北村组封闭管理#</a>：除应急通道一律封闭】7日，湖北省新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情防控指挥部发布关于农村疫情防控措施抓实抓细抓落地的紧急通知。通知称，坚决实行村组封闭管理，村与村之间留一条应急通道由专人值守外，其他路口一律封闭，其中应急通道用车辆隔离，其他区域一律采 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It7aH7XjE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469390831896310:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469390831896310&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【好消息！宁夏又有两例确诊患者出院】2月7日16时30分，经过自治区新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情专家诊疗组和医护人员的精心救治，日前被确诊为新冠肺炎的银川市永宁县患者谢某和兴庆区患者闫某救治情况良好，正式治愈出院。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E5%AE%81%E5%A4%8F%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网宁夏频道">@人民网宁夏频道</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%88%BB%E6%84%8F%E9%9A%90%E7%9E%92%E6%8E%A5%E8%A7%A6%E5%8F%B2%E6%9E%84%E6%88%90%E7%8A%AF%E7%BD%AA%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E5%8F%AF%E5%88%A4%E6%AD%BB%E5%88%91%23&amp;from=default">#刻意隐瞒接触史构成犯罪的最高可判死刑#</a>】7日下午，北京市司法局局长李富莹在北京市新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会上回答提问时表示，非典期间，最高人民法院和最高人民检察院出台了相关司法解释，相关的传染病病区的人员或者跟传染病病人有密切接触的，刻意隐瞒 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/It6Zs1ey1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469383860294253:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469383860294253&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469380341509578" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/It6TM6kI2?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-07 17:12" date="1581066773000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469380341509578:fromprofile"> 2月7日 17:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：坚决拥护中央派出调查组】民有所呼，我有所应。从人民“刷屏”聚焦，到中央作出上述决定，不到半天时间。中央果断派出高层次调查组，足见对此事的高度重视。全面调查、还原真相，一查到底、绝不姑息，这是人民群众的殷切期待，也是中央发出的强烈信号。<a title="人民网评：坚决拥护中央派出调查组" href="http://t.cn/A6Pdzbnn" alt="http://t.cn/A6Pdzbnn" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>人民网评：坚决拥护中央派出调查组</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%A5%B3%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E7%AA%81%E5%8F%91%E7%96%BE%E7%97%85%E9%80%9D%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#南京抗疫女医生突发疾病逝世#</a>】据健康南京，南京市中医院新型冠状病毒感染肺炎防治工作小组组长、副院长徐辉同志，因突发疾病，抢救无效，于2020年2月7日凌晨不幸逝世，享年51岁。南京卫健委哀悼抗疫女医生徐辉，向徐辉同志家属表示诚挚慰问。<a title="南京市卫健委向徐辉同志表示深切哀悼" href="http://t.cn/A6Pd7xlw" alt="http://t.cn/A6Pd7xlw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>南京市卫健委向徐辉同志表示深切哀悼</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【正在直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 健康的武汉，我们等你！】同胞同心，阻击疫情！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网">@人民网</a> 联动湖南经视推出防疫特别直播，为您带来全国疫情防控最新动态，基层一线防控具体工作，直击各地一线医护人员“战疫”情况。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>敬清关注↓↓&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4469378369895122:1034-video:1034%3A4474082553430027:page_100206_home:2286908003:4469378369895122:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Pd29Cv" alt="http://t.cn/A6Pd29Cv" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【致敬！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%237%E5%90%8D%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%E6%96%AD%E5%A5%B6%E5%A5%94%E8%B5%B4%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#7名护士妈妈断奶奔赴一线#</a>】武汉市江夏区中医医院，方文君、刘凤梅等7名正值哺乳期的护士妈妈，集体忍痛断奶，奔赴抗“疫”一线。宝宝最大的10个月，最小的仅4个月，而她们都已经有11天没有见过宝宝了。 患者刘婆婆：选择在这种特殊时期断奶，需要很大的勇气！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B9%8B%E5%A3%B0?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=湖北之声">@湖北之声</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

无一死亡病例】截至7日下午6时，湖南省一天内共有23例新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎患者治愈出院。至此， 湖南累计治愈114名患者，无一死亡病例。今天出院的患者中，长沙市有9例，衡阳市6例，邵阳市3例，怀化市3例，郴州市2例。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E6%B9%96%E5%8D%97%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=湖南日报\">@湖南日报<\/a> <a  title=\"我省新增23例确诊患者治愈出院 累计治愈114名...\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6Pgz2mH\"
